breads.name: Angeligus White Sourdough
breads.description: Rustic everyday bread. Slightly hard shell with a soft bouncy centre.

breads.name: Cassoni Whole Wheat Sourdough
breads.description: This hearty, healthy bread is rich in flavour and texture.

breads.name: Celtic Multigrain Sourdough
breads.description: A robust masterpiece containing a variety of seeds, oats and meals. Nutty and earthy in taste.

breads.name: Cilantro Olive Sourdough
breads.description: Our signature offering! Black Olives, Cilantro & Green Onions

breads.name: Country Rye Sourdough
breads.description: This medium textured old world recipe has an amazing light rye taste.

breads.name: Maria (Light Sourdough)
breads.description: A white Italian-Style bread with a soft, relaxed texture.

breads.name: Marble Sourdough
breads.description: A delicious combination of white and light rye organic flours.

breads.name: Spelt (Non-Sourdough)
breads.description: A pleasing, nutty flavour with substantial texture. Made from 100% organic Spelt flour.

breads.name: Brie (Non-Sourdough)
breads.description: A traditional Normandy recipe. (Contains eggs and butter).

breads.name: Baguette (White / Non Sourdough)
breads.description: Medium crust with a chewy inside.

breads.name: Multigrain Baguette (Non-Sourdough)
breads.description: Our French baguette with whole grain and seeds.

breads.name: Restaurant / Peasant Size Loaves
breads.description: Available: Angeligus, Celtic, Country Rye, Maria & Cilantro Olive

breads.name: Sandwich Buns
breads.description: Made from white organic flour, these buns have a delicate taste and soft texture.

breads.name: Dinner Rolls
breads.description: Available: Celtic, Maria, Angeligus & Cilantro Olive
